10. Representar en punto flotante precisión simple (32 bits):
=>1110111011
1,110111011 x 10^9
exp: 9+127 = 136 = (10001000)
[0][10001000][11011101100000000000000]

=>-13255
-11001111000111
-1,1001111000111 x 10^13
exp: 13+127 = 140 = (10001100)
[1][10001100][10011110001110000000000]

=>9,2588 x 10^4
92588
10110100110101100
1,0110100110101100 x 10^16
exp: 16+127 = 143 = (10001111)
[0][10001111][01101001101011000000000]

11. Cuál es el número representado (punto flotante precisión simple, 32 bits):
[0][10001100][11011011011110000000000]
exp: (10001100) = 140 - 127 = 13
11101101101111,
15215

[1][10000110][00001000000000000000000]
exp: (10000110) = 134 - 127 = 7
10000100,
-132

[1][10001110][00010000111100000000000]
exp: (10001110) = 142 -127 = 15
1000100001111000,
-34936
